A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Movie was a mess. I did not like The force Awakens and this movie just adds more to my hate of the new movies. The last Jedi seemed like it was trying to be a comedy instead of a Star Wars movie. An the total disrespect to Luke to make him seem so weak that he would kill his own apprentice is crazy. The questions I had from TFA did not get answered at all in this movie. An I was left confused and upset. Serious Star War fans that love the lore will leave the movie theaters disappointed.
